entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Burk's Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:19 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 2.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 4:46 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 2.7°C
Pressure: 99.4 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 92 %
Dewpoint: 1.5°C
Wind: WSW 32 km/h gust 46 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending early this evening then cloudy. A few flurries beginning before morning. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or snow squalls. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls ending in the evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow in the evening and after midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
